column1: Little Goat Diner////I had a ton of things go wrong accidently (two different drinks were spilled
column2: etc) and they bent over backwards to make sure they took care of everything and reimbursed me.  They are so
column4: which is rare in a place this popular.  They take such great pride in what they do.  Everyone from the people at the host stand
column5: to the bartenders to the waitress and even the assistant manager were all the loveliest.
